headline: CrowdStrike Achieves 100% Detection and 100% Protection in the Most Demanding MITRE ATT&CK® Enterprise Evaluations to Date
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, December 10, 2025--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) delivered 100% detection and 100% protection with no false positives in the 2025 MITRE ATT&CK® Enterprise Evaluations – the most technically demanding in the program’s history. Through MITRE’s first-ever cloud adversary emulation with attacks that moved across identity, endpoint, and cloud, the unified Falcon® platform demonstrated the architectural advantage required to stop modern cross-domain threats.

headline: Can Next-Generation SIEM Become CrowdStrike's Biggest Growth Engine?
summary: CRWD's Next-Generation SIEM accelerates with record ARR, major wins and AWS integration, strengthening its role as a key platform growth driver.
